Methods

(inner) Loading(props)

Loading spinner component with customizable size, variant, and animation

Parameters:
Name Type Description
props Object
Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
size SPINNER_SIZES <optional>

Controls .spinner--small or .spinner--large classes
variant SPINNER_VARIANTS <optional>

Applies .spinner--dots for dots variant
className string <optional>

Additional classes for .container
color string <optional>

Sets --spinner-color CSS variable
speed ANIMATION_SPEED <optional>

Sets --spinner-speed CSS variable
delay number <optional>

Milliseconds before showing spinner
